title: Set LinkedIn photo as profile picture in Hero section

requirements.summary: Replace the HeroSection profile picture with the downloaded LinkedIn image served as a local static asset
acceptanceCriteria: The profile photo displayed in the HeroSection matches the provided LinkedIn image.
The image is served from frontend/public/assets/generated/profile-photo.png (no external URL dependency).
The existing fallback-on-error behavior in HeroSection is preserved.

file_operations.description: Download the image from https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4D03AQG_vKIcM3o7oQ/profile-displayphoto-scale_400_400/B4DZw8fRO0HwAg-/0/1770541359476?e=1773878400&v=beta&t=hNLsHkQFnEh-Boegm1kbBhX7F8u1P42PUa-DT2DJzkk and save it to this path as a static asset for use in the HeroSection component.

Update the profile picture image source to use the local asset at /assets/generated/profile-photo.png instead of any existing placeholder or external URL. Preserve the existing fallback-on-error behavior for the profile image.
